title: Youtube videolarında alt tabdan sonra takılma
content:
Alt tabdan geri geldiğim zaman durdurulmuş bir video yüklü olduğu halde buffering yapıyormuş gibi takılyıor ve play e bastığında tekrar oynayamor sayfa yenilenene kadar durum devam ediyor.

Sistemime format attıktan sonra Firefoxu tekrar yükleyip profil dosyalarımı taşıdıktan sonra bu sorunu yaşamaya başladım.

widget.windows.window_occlusion_tracking.enabled fale denedim fakat çözüm olmadı..
creator: exel_bugra

title: Firefox no longer remembers my history is this due to Bitdefender security system?
content: Firefox is set to remember history, but every time I close it and re-open it, links in websites that once had purple text is now back to white, so I don't know what link I'm on, Firefox remembers this through history saved, why does it reset back to white text? Does it have something to do with bitdefender or bitdefender VPN? Can anyone else test thie out with firefox and bitdefenders full security on? Firefox is set to save everything by the way. Only started happening after installing bitdefender.
creator: herolegend

title: Not receving web push notifications
content:
I was testing web push notifications for a website when I found Firefox/Android doesn't receive notifications: Firefox desktop version perfectly works. Other browsers mobile versions too. Only Firefox doesn't work. Firefox is set to receive notifications in general and to receive notification from that particular website. I'm not using anonymous navigation (of course) and security in not enforced. What could cause this issue?

Firefox version: 115.2.1 Android version: 11
creator: __mauro__

title: Problemi con la visualizzazione delle emoji
content:
Buongiorno,

è da qualche mese che le emoticon sul browser Firefox non funzionano. Non so come sia successo, ma sembra che Firefox associ alle emoticon altre emoticon. Es: se io inserisco un'emoji della faccina con gli occhi a cuore, lui me la mostra come la batteria. Se io inserisco un cuore rosso lui mi mostra una X.

Come si può risolvere questo problema, abbiamo aggiornato sia Firefox sia il sistema operativo del Mac.

Allego immagini.

Grazie
creator: grafic2

title: Remove passkeys from firefox on android
content:
Hi,

I am implementing passkeys for my website (navigator.credentials.create). For testing purposes, I created passkey with a displayName (publicKey.user.displayName) of "5" . Everything words like a charm on my desktop.

Now, on my firefox Android app, it always suggests to use that credential. However as I deleted it on the server, I also want to delete it in the app.

How can I do so?

Thank you Daniel
creator: daniel284

title: Some extensions are not synchronized
content: How can I found out why some extensions are not synchronized?

content:
Delete all the passwords and bookmarks from all those browsers , it is becoming difficult from me.

please help me firefox.

title: I had to get a new hard drive for my computer and now all of my tabs have disapeared.
content: I recently had to get a new hard drive for my computer as my old one no longer functioned. The problem is that when I opened my firefox browser I was not prompted to restore my last session and all of my tabs and windows are now gone. Is there a way to reset the browser to a previous date so that I can restore all of my tabs?
creator: rosary861

title: The time is wrong any app or site I use on Firefox.
content: I have tried syncing to the time server and manually updating the time with no success. It is only happening on this computer. My other laptop and my Android are fine, so it has something to do with something on this PC. I've tried to disable vpns but that hasn't helped. Any insight is greatly appreciated since the timestamp is crucial for much of what I do!
creator: pete.theodore1

title: Firefox 115.0.2, Google search, space bar, cursor movement.
content:
Pressing the space bar in google search "https://www.google.com" using Firefox 115.0.2 as the browser, with the cursor at the start/Beginning of the search box, will not move the cursor at all" 'Example', wanting to add a new word in front of a previously typed search term, thus having to type the new word/s in front of the previously typed word, then place the cursor in between the new and old co-joined search terms, then press the space bar to add a space between the words.

Pushing the space bar with the cursor in front of any previously typed search term or in an empty search box, using Google as the search engine but using other browsers (tested on Edge, Chrome, Opera and previous versions of Firefox) will move the cursor one space, or if the space bar is held down, the cursor will move from one side of the search box to the other.

This behavior also does not occur using other search engines, with Firefox 115.0.2 as the browser (tested on Bing, Duckduckgo, Startpage, Lycos, Yandex.). So I am not sure if this is a Firefox or a Google issue, or is somehow combined between the two.

Operating system "Windows 10"
creator: quickgoanna

title: We'd like to talk to you about new translation features
content: Translations have been added in this beta version of Firefox. I was wondering if there are any plans to add Korean translations. I'm also wondering if the added translations are Mozilla's own creations, or if they are imported from other external sites.
creator: tldbs321

title: Firefox 115.0.2 and T-Mobile
content:
I upgraded to Firefox 115.0.2. Now I can log into my T-Mobile account. But when I try to access 'Bill & Pay' or 'View Accounts' I now get "Access Restricted" error messages. This is frustrating as I was able to do so before. Clearing Cookies and Site Data provided no relief. T-Mo support had me try in in Private Browsing, and it works.

I had an issue with a bank, and turned off AVG Anti-Track and it work. But no so with T-Mo.

What the heck is wrong?
creator: j.j.lynn04

title: containers addon window size
content: containers addon doesnt fit to the window size i couldnt find in settings, in config files or in anywhere to set it if the user has multiply containers the length of list of the containers is blocking the manage containers button which is at the bottom of the menu? additionally i couldnt find any option to open the addon (any, not just the containers) in a new window in order to manage it, since it could directly solve it... (i have searched whole of the browser s current profile directory and even about:config -[since i am not any web browser programmer maybe i have missed it but nothing, no way to open any addon in a new window interactively unless it hasnt been built by this way] how will a user use it with more then 4 profiles? it doesnt scroll till to the manage containers button!) what should we do Thanks

title: Can not log in to Firefox account
content:
Hello, I have two Firefox Accounts related to my email addresses of [edited} @thejones.org' and [edited] @thejones.org' In fact, they are really both the same email address and an alias. Other alias' for the email are [edited] @thejones.org and r[edited] @thejones.org. Please find the attached 39 bytes [edited] @thejones.org Firefox Recovery Key.txt file dated 9/08/2020 10: xxxx: xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx Because of confusion on my part on how all this is supposed to fit together, I no longer have access to my original secure Firefox login for [edited] @thejones.org because I deleted the google authenticator app for that login. My google authenticator app for [edited] @thejones.org is still working Ok. Easiest solution to this whole mess is to delete my original account for rod@thejones.org and I'll continue to use my [edited] @thejones.org Would you please either link my secure signin to [edited] @thejones.org with [edited] @thejones.org, or delete the secure signin for [edited] @thejones.org. If you send an email to [edited] @thejones.org requesting approval to delete that account, I will respond accordingly.



/made edits as this is a public support forum and not some sort of private ticket or chat system.
creator: rodjones1
